title: 1100 new jobs announced under CPEC: Asim Bajwa
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 27 (APP): Special Assistant to Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting, and Chairman CPEC Authority, Lt. Gen (retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa said on Thursday that as many as 1100 new job opportunities had been announced for various categories under Thar block-1 mining project.
In a tweet he said Shanghai Electric at Thar Block-1 had announced the jobs.
He said locals would get preference in jobs, subject to criteria and qualification.
